title: Week 16 Waivers + Full Stream Ahead, Survival of the Fittest - Fantasy Football Podcast for 12/21
description:
Week 16 Waiver Wire! The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode as we enter the second round of the fantasy playoffs! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Week 16 waiver pickups and QB streamers! Plus, Monday game recaps, Tuesday game updates, and a new edition of “Where There’s Smoke, There’s Fire!” Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for December 21st, 2021.
  
 (03:25) - Monday Night Recap
 (08:20) - Where There’s Smoke, There’s Fire
 (13:50) - NFL News
 (21:10) - Week 16 Waivers
 (21:45) - WR Waivers
 (27:40) - RB Waivers
 (38:10) - TE Waivers
 (40:25) - DST Streamers
 (41:35) - QB Streamers
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
 Visit us on the Web
 Support the Show
 Follow on Twitter
 Follow on Instagram
  
 Check out today's sponsors:

 Pristine Auction -- Registration Code - BALLERS
